      • createProject

        public Project createProject(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String description,
                             TheDate startingDate,
                             double budget,
                             Lead leadRole)
                      throws ModelException
        Method to create a new project and add it to the project list.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the project.
        description - The description of the project.
        startingDate - The starting date of the project.
        budget - The budget of the project.
        leadRole - The lead of the project.
        Returns:
        The newly created project.
        Throws:
        ModelException - One of the given arguments is not valid.

                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 Project project)

        Method to create a subsystem and insert it into an existing project.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new subsystem.
        description - The description of the new subsystem.
        project - The project to insert the new subsystem in.
        Returns:
        The newly created subsystem.
        Throws:
        ModelException - One of the string arguments are wrong.
